display_long_description:
🤖 Pilot a Giant Mech

Kaiju Battle Simulator is sandbox battle simulator centered around combat against mighty Kaiju opponents. Test your mettle against massive monsters using fists, plasma cannons and rocket hammers in this ludicrous physics-based combat action game!

[media]

🤖 Advanced Physics and Destruction

[media]

Some of the most advanced physics-based enemies ever seen in VR, Kaiju walk under their own power and will react realistically to damage. Buildings crumbling and vehicles explode

🤖 Ouch!

[media]

Don't worry, I'm ALL RIGHT!

🤖 Everything is a Weapon

[media]

I'm sure they all evacuated, right?

🤖 Early Access

This is early-access experimental prototype, future updates will bring new features, improvements and other cool stuff

Kaiju Battle Simulator is sandbox battle simulator centered around combat against mighty Kaiju opponents. Test your mettle against massive monsters using fists, plasma cannons and rocket hammers in this ludicrous physics-based combat action game!
